# Scrape the web without getting blocked

Whether youâ€™re scraping for data aggregation, AI training, or price monitoring, blocks disrupt progress. Apifyâ€™s combined anti-blocking solutions let you extract data reliably, even from sites with advanced anti-scraping protections.

[Explore Apify Store](/store)

## No need to start from scratch

With off-the-shelf scrapers in Apify Store, you can extract data from any website instantly. These pre-configured tools handle the complexities of web scraping for youâ€”no technical setup required.

### [Website Content Crawlerapify/website-content-crawlerCrawl websites and extract text content to feed AI models, LLM applications, vector databases, or RAG pipelines. The Actor supports rich formatting using Markdown, cleans the HTML, downloads files, and integrates well with ðŸ¦œðŸ”— LangChain, LlamaIndex, and the wider LLM ecosystem.Apify39.5k4.6/5](/apify/website-content-crawler)### [Instagram Scraperapify/instagram-scraperScrape and download Instagram posts, profiles, places, hashtags, photos, and comments. Get data from Instagram using one or more Instagram URLs or search queries. Export scraped data, run the scraper via API, schedule and monitor runs or integrate with other tools.Apify78.7k4.3/5](/apify/instagram-scraper)### [Google Maps Extractorcompass/google-maps-extractorExtract data from hundreds of places fast. Scrape Google Maps by keyword, category, location, URLs & other filters. Get addresses, contact info, opening hours, popular times, prices, menus & more. Export scraped data, run the scraper via API, schedule and monitor runs, or integrate with other tools.Compass32.4k4.3/5](/compass/google-maps-extractor)

[See all web scraping tools](/store)

## Zero-setup anti-blocking

Apify Store is your fastest path to web scraping without getting blocked. Choose from thousands of ready-made scrapers (Actors) built by experienced developers. These solutions come pre-configured with advanced anti-blocking features, so you can:

Get data instantly

Skip the setup - Actors handle CAPTCHA solving, fingerprinting, and session management out of the box.

With site-specific anti-blocking

Each Actor has built-in protections tailored to the target website for uninterrupted data collection.

Without restrictions

No need to pay extra for anti-blocking services. Anti-scraping features are included in every Actor and Apify plan.

Pay only for successful results

If we get blocked, we try again, but we charge you only for valid output.

## Build reliable scrapers fast

When you need advanced anti-blocking capabilities and full customizability, Apifyâ€™s web scraping libraries and proxy work together to help you build successful scrapers.

[Start with PythonScrape single page with provided URL with HTTPX and extract data from page's HTML with Beautiful Soup.](/templates/python-start)[Start with JavaScriptScrape single page with provided URL with Axios and extract data from page's HTML with Cheerio.](/templates/js-start)[Start with TypeScriptScrape single page with provided URL with Axios and extract data from page's HTML with Cheerio.](/templates/ts-start)

[Browse templates](/templates)

## Real-world fingerprints for you to use

Access hundreds of thousands of real-world fingerprints through our open-source library Crawlee. Designed for developers who need precision and adaptability to scrape complex websites, Crawlee replicates human browsing behavior with features like:

Customizable fingerprinting

Generate realistic session data to bypass detection.

Speed

Use our scraping HTTP client with browser TLS to pass network-level checks.

Performance

Solve the hardest JavaScript challenges with headless browsers.

Proxy tiering

Optimize proxy performance, health, and cost with smart proxy management.

[Get started with Crawlee](https://crawlee.dev/docs/introduction)

### Crawlee - now also in Python

Our open-source library helps you build reliable crawlers. Fast. Your crawlers will appear human-like and fly under the radar of modern bot protections even with the default configuration.

[Read the docs](https://crawlee.dev/python/docs/introduction)

## Reliable, cost-efficient IP management

Apify Proxy is built into the Apify ecosystem and integrates easily with Crawlee and Actors to provide dynamic IP rotation and geolocation targeting. No need to manage multiple vendors. Get reliable anti-blocking capabilities under one roof:

Global reach

Datacenter, residential, and SERP proxies with worldwide coverage.

Dynamic IP rotation

Minimize blocks with automatic IP switching.

Geolocation targeting

Access region-specific content with precision.

[Check out Apify Proxy](/proxy)

## Get past blocks - start scraping reliably

The Apify Free Plan lets you try all Actors and platform features without the need for a credit card.

[Sign up](https://console.apify.com/sign-up)

## Read about anti-blocking and web scraping

Learn how to scrape any website, no matter how hard they try to block you.
